## 1. 
Write a function to calculate the standard deviation from the population variance of
the dataset `pressure`, for the field `pressure`. Display the output along with the values
of this field.

```{r calculate-sd-from-var, echo=TRUE}
calculate_sd_from_var <- function(data, field) {
  values <- data[[field]]
  
  # Calculate population variance
  pop_variance <- sum((values - mean(values))^2) / length(values)
  
  # Calculate population standard deviation
  pop_sd <- sqrt(pop_variance)
  
  # Display results
  cat("Field:", field, "\n")
  cat("Values:\n")
  print(values)
  cat("\nPopulation Variance:", pop_variance, "\n")
  cat("Standard Deviation (from population variance):", pop_sd, "\n")
  
  # Return SD value
  return(pop_sd)
}

# Example usage
data(pressure)
calculate_sd_from_var(pressure, "pressure")
